languages.text: "Неужели какой-то жалкий мятеж является достойной причиной для столь убогой церемонии встречи Вольного Торговца? Я оскорблен{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Неужели какой-то жалкий мятеж является достойной причиной для столь убогой церемонии встречи Вольного Торговца? Я оскорблен{mf||а}".

languages.text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."
languages.original_text: "Неужели какой-то жалкий мятеж является достойной причиной для столь убогой церемонии встречи Вольного Торговца? Я оскорблен{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a pallid welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? I am offended."
"How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a pallid welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? I am offended."
"How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a pallid welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It's insulting."
"How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a pallid welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It's insulting."
"How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."
"How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

languages.text: "Wie kann eine jämmerliche Rebellion ausreichen, {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} eine derart erbärmliche Begrüßung zu bereiten? Das ist eine Beleidigung."
languages.original_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

traits.locale_text: "Wie kann eine jämmerliche Rebellion ausreichen, {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} eine derart erbärmliche Begrüßung zu bereiten? Das ist eine Beleidigung."

languages.text: « Comment se fait-il qu'une petite rébellion de rien du tout vous empêche d'accueillir dignement {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ? C'est une insulte à mon titre ! »
languages.original_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

traits.locale_text: « Comment se fait-il qu'une pitoyable petite rébellion vous empêche d'accueillir dignement {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ? C'est une insulte à mon titre ! »

languages.text: “不过是场微不足道的叛乱，居然让行商浪人的欢迎典礼变得这么寒酸？这简直是在侮辱人。”
languages.original_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

traits.locale_text: “不过是场微不足道的叛乱，居然让行商浪人的欢迎典礼变得这么寒酸？这简直是在侮辱人。”

languages.text: 「哀れな反乱のせいで、自由開拓者の到着を祝した歓迎セレモニーがこのように華がないとは、納得できる理由になるか？けしからん」
languages.original_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

traits.locale_text: 「哀れな反乱のせいで、自由開拓者の到着を祝した歓迎セレモニーがこのように淡白とは、納得できる理由になるか？けしからん」

languages.text: «¿Cómo puede una patética rebelión ser causa suficiente para que la ceremonia de bienvenida en honor de la llegada de un Comerciante Independiente sea tan insulsa? Es un insulto».
languages.original_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo puede una patética rebelión ser causa suficiente para que la ceremonia de bienvenida en honor de la llegada de un Comerciante Independiente sea tan apagada? Es insultante».

languages.text: "Acınası bir isyanın, bir Hür Tacir'in gelişi şerefine böylesine cansız bir karşılama törenine sebep olduğu nerede görülmüş? Resmen şahsıma hakaret."
languages.original_text: "How can some pathetic rebellion be cause enough for such a lacklustre welcoming ceremony in honour of a Rogue Trader's arrival? It is an insult."

traits.locale_text: "Acınası bir isyanın, bir Hür Tacir'in gelişi şerefine böylesine cansız bir karşılama törenine sebep olduğu nerede görülmüş? Resmen şahsıma hakaret."
